newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Sweden to auction of 8.0 bln skr worth of T-bills.
newsitem.headline: Sweden to auction of 8.0 bln skr worth of T-bills.

text.p: Sweden's National Debt Office said on Wednesday it would invite bids for an auction of Treasury bills.
The auction will take place on February 19, it said and bids are due at 1130 GMT on the day of the auction. Settlement date is February 21.
Maturity date Issue volume Number of days
